bilingual.source: The shopkeeper put Charlie's change on the counter.
bilingual.target: 店主把查理的零钱放在柜台上。

bilingual.source: Charlie entered the shop and laid the damp fifty pence on the counter.
bilingual.target: 查理走进商店，把湿漉漉的五十便士放在柜台上。

bilingual.source: He went to the counter to change money.
The jug is on the kitchen counter.
She put the keys on the counter.
He went to the counter to claim a prize.
He laid his keys on the counter.
bilingual.target: 他放置了钥匙在柜台上。

list.abstract: COUNTER，格斗游戏中的常用词语，一般来说是指成功将对手的攻击截击，即在对手使出招式之时，我方成功作出攻击拦截。

yingyinNormal.en: Dinosaur kale gone. You're just putting it on the counter?
yingyinNormal.zh: 恐龙甘蓝都拿掉了。你不过是拿出来放在柜台上？

yingyinNormal.en: Don't make me climb over this counter. Come on. Let's go. Come on.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别逼我翻过这柜台。来吧，我们走，来吧。

yingyinNormal.en: It was a 50's theme restaurant. I have to cook in a costume and dance on the counter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是一家50年代主题的餐厅，我得穿戏服做菜在柜台上跳舞。

yingyinNormal.en: Why not? Did you notice the sign on his counter? He's not a full-time dry cleaner. He also makes keys.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么没有？你注意到他柜台上的标志了吗？他不是全职干干洗的，他还配钥匙。

yingyinNormal.en: What about the girl behind the counter?
yingyinNormal.zh: 那店员小姐呢？

yingyinNormal.en: We chose over the counter cough medications.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们选择咳疾治疗作为对象。

yingyinNormal.en: It's moves and counter-moves. That's all we gotta look at.
yingyinNormal.zh: 方法和破解方法，注意一下就是了。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh my God. That guy at the counter is totally checking you out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的天，吧台那个男人在看你。

yingyinNormal.en: Right now, John, the stock trades over the counter at 10 cents a share.
yingyinNormal.zh: 就是现在 John这支股票场外交易价格是10美分一股。

yingyinNormal.en: Do we have to put the toilet on the counter? I take my afternoon coffee here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 非得把马桶放在桌子上吗？我在这里喝午后咖啡的。

yingyinNormal.en: Even with Snape muttering his little counter curse. Snape was trying to save me?
yingyinNormal.zh: 就算斯内普再怎么念反咒也救不了你。他念咒语是想要救我？

yingyinNormal.en: Hang on, Kripke. A loop counter and an escape to the least objectionable activity.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别挂，Kripke，没办法时，选择不太讨厌的项目。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm sure he was very convincing. All Russian diplomats go through FSB counter-intel training.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我相信他一定很令人信服，俄国所有外交官都经过了俄联邦安全局的反情报训练。

yingyinNormal.en: Hunt is uniquely trained and highly motivated. A specialist without equal, immune to any counter measures.
yingyinNormal.zh: 亨特是经过特别训练的人，而且不达目的誓不罢休，没有人能与他抗衡，他也不露出任何破绽。

yingyinNormal.en: It's gotta be one of a kind. You know like, you know, what's that God awful ceramic fruit bowl she has on her counter?
yingyinNormal.zh: 她喜欢独一无二，就像她那个丑到不行的水果陶碗。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, don't worry. I've got a camera right up here, so I could watch from the counter and make sure guys aren't being pervs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不用担心，我在这里正上方装了监控，这样我就能从收银台监视确保没有变态男客偷看。

yingyinNormal.en: Please, let's go home. See, he and this Wolfshiem, they bought up drugstores. And sold bootlegged alcohol over the counter.
yingyinNormal.zh: 求你了，咱们回家吧。他和沃尔夫山姆这家伙买下了很多杂货店，暗地里贩卖私酒。

yingyinNormal.en: Here's my counter. No proceeds for the book, no alimony, massive reduction in child support, or you can get the hell out of here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的回应是不，准再问有关书的内容，没有赡养费，小孩抚养费要大幅减少，不同意的话，你们就可以滚出这里了。

yingyinNormal.en: I do not. You asked that couple we met at the car-rental counter to vacation with us. It would have been rude not to. It was our honeymoon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我哪有。你邀请我们在租车行碰见的那对夫妻跟我们一起度假。不邀请感觉很没礼貌啊。可那是我们的蜜月之旅啊。

yingyinNormal.en: Got it. All right, I'm thinking one way to counter bias in the peer-review process, is for papers to be submitted under gender-neutral names. Like S. Smith instead of Samantha Smith.
yingyinNormal.zh: 明白，我想到了一个避免在同行评审阶段遭受歧视的方法，就是报告都用中性名字递交，比如S·史密斯，而不是沙曼莎·史密斯。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_usage.usage:
counter用作及物动词时，可接名词或名词从句作宾语。用作不及物动词时，常与介词with搭配，表示“以...作为反驳/还击”。例：
The union countered with letters rebutting the company's claims.
工会写信驳回了公司的要求。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: And, they <highlight>countered</highlight> that no negative effects of bilingual education have been found.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而且，他们反驳说，没有发现双语教育的负面影响。

examination_example.sentence: Smith <highlight>counters</highlight> that if you factor in the hidden cost of government corn subsidies and environment degradation, grass-fed is the more cost-effective model.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 史密斯反驳说，如果考虑到隐形成本如政府玉米补贴和环境恶化等因素，草饲是更具成本效益的模式。

examination_example.sentence: With several monitoring stations operating in Antarctica, Russia is trying hard to <highlight>counter</highlight> America's dominance in the field of worldwide navigational facilities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于南极洲有多个监测站，俄罗斯正在努力对抗美国在全球导航设施领域的主导地位。

examination_example.sentence: They can usually be found in the ticket <highlight>counter</highlight> area interacting with travelers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在售票区通常可以看到他们在和旅客互动的身影。

examination_example.sentence: You should never use any over-the-<highlight>counter</highlight> drug on a regular, continued basis, or in large quantities, except on your doctor's advice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 除非遵从医嘱，你绝不应该长期连续地服用非处方药，也绝不能大量服用。

examination_example.sentence: Young beauty shoppers are often turning to Sephora or Ulta instead of department store beauty <highlight>counters</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 年轻的美容购物者经常转向 Sephora 或 Ulta 而不是百货公司的美容柜台。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。
